//
// Generated by Microsoft (R) HLSL Shader Compiler 9.29.952.3111
//
// Parameters:
//
//   float3 CamDir;
//   sampler2D DepthTexture_ss;
//   sampler2D GBuffer2Texture_ss;
//   float2 NearFar;
//   sampler2D ShadowMaskTexture_ss;
//
//
// Registers:
//
//   Name                 Reg   Size
//   -------------------- ----- ----
//   CamDir               c0       1
//   NearFar              c1       1
//   DepthTexture_ss      s0       1
//   GBuffer2Texture_ss   s1       1
//   ShadowMaskTexture_ss s2       1
//
//
// Default values:
//
//   CamDir
//     c0   = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
//
//   NearFar
//     c1   = { 0, 0, 0, 0 };
//

// c210 - Inverse ViewProj - from parent VS

// Point lights - in entrances

    ps_3_0
def c200, 1, 0.01, 0.0625, 0.5
dcl_2d s13
    def c2, 1, -0.0500000007, 0, 0
    dcl_texcoord v0.xyz
    dcl_texcoord1 v1.xyz
    dcl_texcoord2_pp v2
    dcl_texcoord3 v3
    dcl_2d s0
    dcl_2d s1
    dcl_2d s2
	
    texldp r0, v3, s0
    mul r0.x, r0.x, c1.y
mov r30.x, r0.x						// Store scaled depth
    nrm r1.xyz, v1
    dp3 r0.y, c0, r1
    rcp r0.y, r0.y
    mul r0.x, r0.y, r0.x
    //mad_pp r0.xyz, r1, -r0.x, v2	// Split that instruction in two:
mul r29, r1, -r0.x					// r29 is in world coordiantes
	
// Stereo correction formula
texld r31, c200.z, s13
add r31.w, r30.x, -r31.y			// Scaled depth - convergence
mul r31.w, r31.w, r31.x				// (.) * separation

// Transform correction from screen to world coordinates
mul r30.x, r31.w, c210.x
mul r30.y, r31.w, c211.x
mul r30.z, r31.w, c212.x
//mul r30.w, r31.w, c213.x

// Apply correction
add r29.xyz, r29.xyz, r30.xyz
// 2nd half of split instruction:
add r0.xyz, r29.xyz, v2

    dp3_pp r0.x, r0, r0
    rcp_pp r0.x, r0.x
    mad_sat_pp r0.x, r0.x, v2.w, c2.y
    mul_pp r0.xyz, r0.x, v0
    texldp_pp r1, v3, s1
    add r0.w, -r1.w, c2.x
    mul_pp r1.xyz, r0.w, r1
    texldp_pp r2, v3, s2
    mul_pp r1.xyz, r1, r2.x
    mul_pp oC0.xyz, r0, r1
    mov oC0.w, c2.z

// approximately 20 instruction slots used (3 texture, 17 arithmetic)
